name: simple
manifest:
---
# Source: jobchart/templates/test-connection.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: "simple-jobchart-test-simple"
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: jobchart-0.1.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: jobchart
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: simple
    app.kubernetes.io/version: "1.16.0"
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
spec:
  containers:
  - name: jmmaster
    image: capplatform.azurecr.io/jmeter/master:47671
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    env:
    - name: JMX_FILE
      value: /simple.jmx
    volumeMounts:
      - name: loadtest
        mountPath: /load_test
        subPath: "load_test"
      - name: simple
        mountPath: /simple.jmx
        subPath: "simple.jmx"
    ports:
    - containerPort: 60000
  volumes:
  - name: loadtest 
    configMap:
     name: jmeter-load-test
     defaultMode: 0777
  - name: simple 
    configMap:
     name: jmeter-load-simple
  restartPolicy: Never

hooks.name: simple-jobchart-test-connection
hooks.manifest:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: "simple-jobchart-test-connection"
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: jobchart-0.1.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: jobchart
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: simple
    app.kubernetes.io/version: "1.16.0"
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
  annotations:
    "helm.sh/hook": test-success
spec:
  containers:
    - name: wget
      image: busybox
      command: ['wget']
      args: ['simple-jobchart:80']
  restartPolicy: Never
